content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To start with, I believe the current asking price could be more flexible considering the location's market situation and my dependability as a tenant. Could we explore a lower option, say around 850 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the value of my apartment is much higher than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. However, if you could consider my excellent academic background and responsible nature, it might significantly reduce any potential risks as a tenant. Would you be willing to hear a counterproposal near 900 Euros monthly?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I still believe the value of my apartment is much higher than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In that case, I deeply appreciate your time showing me the apartment and wish you a successful rental search. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
